content.chorus:
Otito diri Chineken'elu kasi elu
N'uwa udo diri mmadu ndi ihe ha na-aso Chukwu (Dc)
verses: Refrain: Udo diri mmadu ndi ihe ha na-aso Chukwu

Anvi eto Gi anyi ekwuputa oluoma Gi (Ref)
Anyi esekpuere Gi anyi edo Gi ebube(Ref)
Anyi ekele Gi n'ihi nnukwu ebube Gi(Ref & Chorus)

Osebruwa Chineke, Eze nke Eluigwe (Ref)
Chukwu Nna Onye ji ike nile (Ref)
Onyenweanyi Jesu Kristi so otu nwa Chineke muru (Ref & Chorus)

Dinwenu anyi bu Chukwu (Ref)
Nwaturu nke Chineke Nwa nke Nna (Ref)
Onye na ekpochapu njo nke uwa meere anyi ebere (Ref & Chorus)

Onye na ekpochapu njo nke uwa nuru aririo anyi (Ref)
Onye no n'aka nri Nna meere anyi ebere (Ref)
N'ihi na so Gi di aso, so Gi bu Dinwenu (Ref & Chorus)

So Gi O Jesu Kristi (Ref)
Kacha di elu nyere Muo Nso (Ref)
N'ebube Chineke Nna (Ref)
Amen! Amen! Amen!
Amen! Amen! Amen!
